A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed this movie from start to finish. I don't understand the hate. I am not a shipper of Reylo. I did see their connection\, but I also noticed how truly lost Kylo is. He managed to manipulate Rey \, but she saw through it. In the end\, she shut the door on him. I feel lik people sometimes like to be apart of the in crowd and put down a movie just because.  Rian Johnson surprised me. I'm looking forward to episode 9.
